input.sentences: when the girls come over | we have a lot of wine .
i fix a big bowl of strawberries with chocolate and grapes .
[female] can always be counted on to get up and sing .
the girls sure love their strawberries .
by the end of the night | the plate is empty and the girls are full .
output.sentences: Becky went over to Cindy's house for a Single Ladies Valentines Day Party.
Cindy served wine and chocolate-covered strawberries along with many other snacks.
Becky had one too many and started dancing on the furniture but the girls let her do her thing.
In the living room Cindy, Mindy, Mandy and Candy polished off the strawberries while watching The Notebook.
Once the movie was over, and the strawberries were gone, the girls all went home and talked to their numerous cats.
